JobFullDesc: Are you an experienced, passionate pioneer in technology? A roll-up-your-sleeves leader who wants be part of a collaborative environment? A leader who can incorporate new ideas in a think-tank and share new ideas with your colleagues? If so, consider an opportunity with our US Delivery Center - we are breaking the mold of a typical Delivery Center. Our US Delivery Centers have been growing since 2014 with significant, continued growth on the horizonAre you an experienced, passionate pioneer in technology? An industry solutions professionalwho wants to work in a collaborativeenvironment.As an experienced IBM Devops Lead you will have the ability to share new ideas and collaborate on projects as a consultant without the extensive demands of travel.Consider an opportunity with our US Delivery Center - we are breaking the mold of a typical Delivery Center.  Our US Delivery Centers have been growing since 2014 with significant, continued growth on the horizon. Interested? Read more about our opportunity below ...  Work you'll do/Responsibilities  •Install, configure, troubleshoot, and deploy middleware applications/IBM COTS in the operational environment on RHEL •Promote changes created by Developers through the environments and into production •Write deployment scripts using CLI (Command Line Interface), Shell and Jenkins •Develop and implement Security strategies within technology space to ensure a secure middleware environment •Perform upgrades and patch installations, Monitor the performance of Servers •System security patch implementation and vulnerability management, Configure TLS1.2 on Servers •Maintain system availability and troubleshoot problems, troubleshoot network related issues-not solve them, just narrow down the problem •Create and manage user accounts and domains, install and configure LDAP •Test, tweak and tune various WebSphere settings •Define, track and maintain system configuration documents and standards The Team  Deloitte's Government & Public Services practice-our people, ideas, technology and outcomes-is designed for impact. Our team of over 15,000+ professionals bring fresh perspective to help you anticipate disruption, reimagine the possible, and fulfill your mission promise . The US Core Industry Solutions Offering encompasses industry vertical, sector specific solutions that leverage distinct technologies to drive operational change and automate the core our client's business. We incorporate expertise from across the firm to leverage common approaches, best practices, and strategic investments to scale these solutions according to industry strategy. Core Industry Solutions will be known in the market for a focus on transforming industry operations through industry technology solutions.  Qualifications  Required IBM Datapower Master Data Management •Experience in installing, configuring, and maintaining WebSphere Application Server on RHEL •Administrative Experience with WebSphere suite of products, IBM MDM, IBM RDM, IBM IIS, IBM WSRR, IBM MQ, IBM IIB •Experience creating scripts ( wsadmin /shell/PERL/ANT/ Jython /Python/JACL) •Jenkins IBM Datapower IBM Integration Bus IBM Websphere Message Broker Master Data Management •VMware •SDLC (Waterfall and Agile) •Strong oral and written communication skills  Bachelor's degree or equivalent years of relevant experience  Must be willing to relocate or live near Lake Mary, FL. Gilbert, AZ or Mechanicsburg, PA  Must be able to travel up to 15% (while 15% of travel is a requirement of the role, due to Covid-19, non-essential travel has been suspended until further notice.  Limited Sponsorship may be available.  How you'll grow  At Deloitte, our professional development plan focuses on helping people at every level of their career to identify and use their strengths to do their best work every day. From entry-level employees to senior leaders, we believe there's always room to learn. We offer opportunities to help sharpen skills in addition to hands-on experience in the global, fast-changing business world. From on-the-job learning experiences to formal development programs, our professionals have a variety of opportunities to continue to grow throughout their career.
